Get configured

Created by The WI+RE Team

Set up your computer to access UCLA Library resources (such as databases, electronic journals, and e-books) from off-campus.

Want more help? Click here to learn more about getting configured!

Tips:

  • starsBe sure to configure your computer for off-campus access before you leave campus!
